name: Dwarf
description: Brave, stalwart folk as sturdy as the stone kingdoms they carve inside mountains. You know the Common and Dwarvish languages

talents.name: stout
talents.description: Roll your hit dice gains with advantage.

name: Goblin
description: Green, clever beings who thrive in dark, cramped places. As fierce as they are tiny. You know the Common and Goblin languages.

name: Elf
description: Ethereal, graceful people who revere knowledge and beauty. Elves see far and live long.

talents.name: farsight
talents.description: You get a +1 bonus to attack rolls with ranged weapons or a +1 bonus to spellcasting checks.

name: Halfling
description: Small, cheerful country folk with mischievous streaks. They enjoy lifeâ€™s simple pleasures.

talents.name: stealthy
talents.description: Once per day, you can become invisible for 3 rounds.

name: Half-Orc
description: Towering, tusked warriors who are as daring as humans and as relentless as orcs.

talents.name: mighty
talents.description: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls with melee weapons.

name: Human
description: Bold, adaptable, and diverse people who learn quickly and accomplish mighty deeds.

talents.name: ambitious
talents.description: You gain one additional talent roll at 1st level.
